But the problem is the transcript doesn't talk much about maintenance. It's more about the potential and design aspects. Therefore, perhaps the most appropriate answer is to treat the main topics of the transcript as the MAINTASKs with the relevant subtasks, as I started in the prior version.
Design and implement vertical farming systems for urban areas
Promote urban planning strategies that support vertical farming
Overcome resistance from agricultural industries to vertical farming adoption
Transition a city block into a vertical farm
Adapt a commercial building into a vertical farm
Integrate vertical farming into a city's infrastructure
Integrate agricultural and urban planning strategies for sustainability
Transition a traditional city into a sustainable vertical farming hub
subtasks: Research and select appropriate crops for efficient indoor growth
Design water filtration systems using nanotechnology to conserve resources
Retrofit buildings with passive solar panels and other energy-efficient features
Promote high-density living and mixed-use structures for urban renewal
Educate community members about the benefits of vertical farming
Collaborate with local authorities to create supportive policies for vertical farming adoption
